properties.Name: MarketingCampaign

Columns.Name: MarketingCampaignId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Marketing Campaign.

Columns.Name: MarketingCampaignName
Columns.Description: The name of the Marketing Campaign.

Columns.Name: MarketingCampaignDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the Marketing Campaign.

Columns.Name: MarketingCampaignObjectivesStatement
Columns.Description: Goals to be accomplished by an organization's overall Marketing Campaign such as sales, market share, or profitability.

Columns.Name: MarketingCampaignStrategyStatement
Columns.Description: Strategy to be used by an organization's overall Marketing Campaign such as sales, market share, or profitability.

Columns.Name: MarketingCampaignStartDate
Columns.Description: The start date of the Marketing Campaign.

Columns.Name: MarketingCampaignEndDate
Columns.Description: The end date of the Marketing Campaign.

Columns.Name: TotalMarketingCampaignCostAmount
Columns.Description: The total costs expended in relation with the associated Marketing Campaign.

Columns.Name: TotalNumberManDaysExpended
Columns.Description: The total number of man-days expended in association with the associated Marketing Campaign.

Columns.Name: MarketingCampaignNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding a Marketing Campaign.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: BrandId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Brand.

Properties.Description:
A Marketing Campaign is a planned series of Marketing Events designed to promote the sale of one or more Products/Services.

Note:

Because Marketing Campaigns may support the sale of one or more Products, the actual Products promoted are done so at the Marketing Event level.
